name: Customizable Cookies and Cream Cake
description: Cookies take the cake with this dessert. The filling is a creamy chocolate whipped icing infused with crumbled cookies, and the outside is garnished with rich chocolate ganache and whole and crumbled cookies. We suggest chocolate cake.Experienced cake decorators can create a custom version of this cake complete with your choice of flavor and personal message. Serves up to 20

name: Floral Design Cake
description: Beautiful floral cake design perfect to celebrate any occasion.Experienced cake decorators will create a custom version of this cake complete with your choice of flavor and personal message.To begin customizing your cake, add it to your cart.Serves up to 20

name: Large Dessert Tart
description: Triple-Berry Tart baked to perfection, fully topped with fruits and garnished with dark chocolate.Serves 4

name: Deli Sandwich Combo Platter
description: Made fresh to orderIncludes lettuce, & tomatoes.Choose your combination from Turkey, Roast Beef, Ham, Ultimate, Italian, Deluxe, or Veggie and Bread selections of White or 5 Grain Italian as well as a variety of cheeses.To begin customizing your platter, add it to your cart.

name: Customizable Party Balloon Cake
description: This cake features luscious icing "balloons" and a banner just right for the perfect sentiment.Experienced cake decorators will create a custom version of this cake complete with your choice of flavor and personal message. A beautiful cake perfect for your occasion.To begin customizing your cake, add it to your cart.Serves up to 20

name: Dessert Tart Platter
description: Triple-Berry Tart baked to perfection, fully topped with fruits and garnished with dark chocolate.

name: Shrimp & Surimi Platter
description: A ready-to-eat platter of surimi and medium shrimp, prepared fresh for your yacht charter, served with tangy cocktail sauce.

name: Mini Muffin Platter
description: An abundance of small muffins in four delicious flavors: chocolate chip, lemon poppy seed, banana, and blueberry.

name: Garden Vegetable Platter
description: * Prepared fresh * Veggie platter includes carrots, tomatoes, cauliflower, celery, broccoli, cucumbers* Choice of ranch or blue cheese dressing

name: Fresh Fruit Platter
description: An arrangement of fresh, seasonal fruit, including grapes, strawberries, apples, pineapple, and melons.

name: Ocean Choice Shrimp Platter
description: A ready-to-eat platter of extra-large shrimp, prepared fresh for your yacht charter,  served with traditional lemon slices and tangy cocktail sauce.

name: Gourmet Meat and Cheese Platter
description: Boarâ€™s Head turkey and maple honey ham, paired with yellow American and Swiss cheeses.

name: Prosciutto Skewers Platter
description: Skewers include: prosciutto, grape tomatoes, basil leaves, mozzarella cheese and balsamic glaze.

name: Mini Croissant Platter
description: Mini croissants filled with Ham, Egg, Tuna, & Chunky Chicken salads, and Cheddar Jack Cheese Spread.

name: Med Style Relish Platter
description: Prepared fresh, includes olives, pepperoncini, Kosher dill spears, & sweet gherkins.

name: Gourmet Spirals Platter
description: Made fresh to order, select from one of the following combinations. To begin customizing your platter, first add it to your cart.Roast Beef includes:Top round Roast Beef, Swiss Cheese, garlic and herb spread, spinach, tomatoes, dill pickles, black olives marinated artichokes and green pepper rolled in lavish bread.Italian Includes: Tavern Ham, capocollo, Genoa salami, provolone cheese, garlic and herb spread, spinach, tomatoes, marinated artichokes, and green peppers rolled in lavash bread.Turkey, bacon, and Avocado includes: Oven roasted turkey breast, bacon, garlic and herb spread, guacamole and spinach rolled in lavash bread.Ham and Cheese includes: Tavern Ham, yellow American cheese, garlic and herb spread, shredded lettuce, and pickles rolled in lavash bread.Vegetarian includes:Garlic and herb spread, spinach, tomatoes, matchstick carrots, mushrooms, black olives, marinated artichokes, sunflower seeds and guacamole rolled in lavash bread.

name: Greek Style Pasta Salad Bowl
description: Includes a delightful combination of feta cheese, briny olives, fresh spinach, and macaroni-style pasta. This dish serves approximately 10 people.

name: Cheese Taster Platter
description: Includes cubes of Boar's Head Vermont Cheddar, Smoked Gruyere, Gouda, Colby, Havarti, Muenster, Pepperjack, and Swiss.

name: Decadent Brownie Platter
description: Indulge in a rich combination of cookies and chocolate brownies studded with semisweet chocolate chips paired with moist chocolate brownies, also with semisweet chocolate chips. No artificial colors or flavors, leaving lots of room for delicious.

name: Grilled Chicken Pasta Bowl
description: Seasoned grilled chicken is perfectly combined with fresh, ripe tomatoes, finely chopped chives, and delectable macaroni style pasta. This delightful dish serves approximately 10 people.

name: Gourmet Brownie Bites
description: Moist and rich mini chocolate brownies, individually decorated with variety of toppings.

name: Tasty Delights Platter
description: A variety of pastry and bakery favorites, with assorted donut gems, brioche chocolate croissants, and assorted mini muffins.

name: Classic Variety Dip Platter
description: The Classic Variety Dip Platter is always a party pleaser. Large platter includes: Buffalo Chicken Dip, Classic Hummus, Artichoke and Spinach Dip,  Baby Carrots, Broccoli Florets, Pretzel Crisps and Pita Chips.Smaller platter includes: Classic Hummus, Artichoke and Spinach Dip,  Baby Carrots, Cucumbers, Pretzel Crisps and Pita Chips.

name: Custom Charcuterie Box
description: A wonderful assortment made with your choice of high end charcuteries, artisan cheeses, fruits and accompaniments. To begin customizing your platter, add the item to your cart.

name: Dark Chocolate Hummus Desert Platter
description: Platter includes: dark chocolate dessert hummus, fresh pineapple, strawberries, honeydew melon, raspberries, blueberries, and cinnamon sugar pita chips.

name: Greek Style Hummus Platter
description: Assortment of lemon pepper chicken skewers, feta cheese, kalamata olive hummus and tzatziki. Flax, oat, and bran wheat mini pita snacks, sliced cucumbers, grape tomatoes, and mixed olives.

name: Gourmet Pastry Platter
description: Delicious bite size pastries. Comes with cheese, guava and guava/cheese turnover and bites.

name: Chicken Tenders
description: Boneless, white meat chicken tenders, cooked to crispy perfection. Includes dipping sauce.Made fresh Ready to eat Served hot

name: Popcorn Chicken
description: Boneless, white meat chicken, cooked to crispy perfection. Includes dipping sauce.Made fresh Ready to eat  Served hot

name: Cuban Sandwich Platter
description: Cuban bread layered with sweet ham, roast pork, Swiss cheese, pickles, and a mustard and mayonnaise mix.

name: Vegetarian Greek Style Salad Platter
description: Lettuce blend, feta, tomato, garbanzo beans, kalamata olives, cucumber, pepperoncini, and onions with red wine vinegar dressing.

name: Gourmet Tart Platter
description: Tart shells filled with cannoli cream, hazelnut and peanut butter European cream.

name: Bachelorette Bridal Cupcakes
description: One last sail before the veil! Celebrate sweetly with these bachelorette or bridal party cupcakes.They conveniently pull apart into individual cupcakes but give the effect of a full sized cake without the mess of cutting.Choose either vanilla or chocolate cupcakes covered in butternut cream and add a personal message.Note: Decorative ribbon is not edible, but is safe for food contact. Do not eat.Contains 28 cupcakes

name: Wild Salmon Salad Platter
description: Spring mix, wild caught salmon, tomatoes, cucumber, egg, red onion, and capers and Tuscan herb dressing.

name: Caesar Salad Platter
description: Fresh Romaine lettuce blend, grilled chicken, parmesan cheese, and croutons. Comes with Caesar dressing.

name: Sweet Brie Fruit Platter
description: Fresh French brie glazed with peach preserves and honey, Comes topped with almonds and cranberries. Also includes grapes, strawberries, & apples.

name: Gourmet Meat and Cheese Cube Platter
description: Features cubes of gourmet Boar's Head turkey, genoa salami and tavern ham. Paired with cubes of vermont cheddar, pepper jack cheese, & gouda. Garnished with center spindle of fruit.

name: Deli Egg Platter
description: Prepared fresh, savory seasoning with just the right pop of flavor, served with a garnish of black olives.

name: Chocolate Red Velvet Cake
description: Red velvet cake mixed with chocolate buttercream. Icing in chocolate fudge and chocolate buttercream. Topped with chocolate ganache and mini chocolate crispies.Serves up to 10

name: German Chocolate Cake
description: Rich chocolate cake iced in chocolate buttercream and filled with German chocolate filling. Topped with chocolate ganache, toasted coconut and more German chocolate. German chocolate includes pecans and coconut.Serves up to 10

name: Banana Pudding Cake
description: Vanilla cake iced in whipped topping and filled with banana custard. Garnished with vanilla wafers, banana chips and banana custard swirl.Serves up to 8

name: Strawberry Dulce De Leche Cake
description: Vanilla cake filled with fresh strawberries and dulce de leche and iced in dulce de leche whipped topping. Topped with toasted almonds and fresh strawberries.Serves up to 10

name: Strawberry Vanilla Almond Cream Cake
description: Almond-flavored vanilla cake iced in whipped topping and filled with European cream. Topped with toasted almonds and fresh strawberries.Serves up to 10

name: Slider Trio Sandwich Platter
description: Made fresh to orderIncludes lettuce, & tomatoes.Roast Turkey and Fontina, Smoked Ham and Mild Swiss, London Broil Roast Beef and Vermont Cheddar and a mayonnaise/yellow mustard mix on a sweet roll.

name: Antipasti Platter
description: Made fresh to orderAssorted Italian meats, cheeses, pepperoncinis and Mediterranean Kalamata olives.

name: Bread Bowl Dip Platter
description: Indulge in our freshly baked bread bowl, overflowing with a rich and creamy spinach dip. Made from a warm pumpernickel loaf, this delectable dish comes with generous bites of pumpernickel and marble rye bread, perfect for dipping. Experience a flavor sensation that will elevate your gathering and delight your guests. Treat yourself to this irresistible appetizer today!

name: Mediterranean Charcuterie Box
description: Includes a wonderful spread of Chorizo, Prosciutto, Manchego Cheese, Mozzarella Cheese, Olives, Salted Almonds, White Seedless Grapes, Naked Wild Honey, Fresh Rosemary.

name: Lettuce Wraps
description: Red Pepper Hummus, shredded carrots, bell peppers, and feta cheese wrapped in crisp lettuce.

name: Southern Cobb Salad Platter
description: Lettuce blend, chicken tenders, blue cheese, praline pecans, tomatoes, dried cranberries, and green apples. with balsamic dressing.

name: Chocolate Strawberry Platter
description: Two varieties of chocolate dipped strawberries: plain and trio crispies.

name: Delightful Deserts Platter
description: An assortment of delectable bakery delights, the Delightful Deserts Platter will satisfy the pickiest of sweet lovers on your guest list. Comes with a variety of brownies, cheesecake bites, miniature cannoli, chocolate-covered strawberries, and vanilla wafer buttercream sandwiches.

name: Tabouli Salad
description: Prepared fresh and individually for your yacht charter experience, this dish serves as a delightful vegetarian protein source. It features a flavorful combination of bulgur, ripe tomatoes, crisp onions, fragrant parsley, and refreshing mint. This vibrant dish can serve as either a great side salad or a satisfying main dish, perfect for enjoying on the water. Serves around 10 people.

name: Chicken Wings Sampler Platter
description: Prepared fresh individually for your yacht charterDouble-breaded Fresh chilled Choice of sauces To begin customizing your platter, add it to your cart.

name: Med Style Naan Platter
description: Miniature naan bread topped with fresh lemon pepper chicken, hummus, cucumber slices, shredded carrots, and feta cheese.

name: Savory Naan Platter
description: Miniature naan bread topped with fresh chicken, bacon, baby spinach, and buttermilk ranch dressing.

name: Gourmet Wraps Platter
description: Made fresh to order, includes lettuce and tomato, to begin customizing your platter, first add it to your cart.

name: Gourmet Croissant Platter
description: 26 count of a delightful variety of mini buttery croissants, the flavors include: plain, everything, glazed, chocolate dipped, and cinnamon sugar. Something savory and something sweet.

name: Gourmet Cookie Platter
description: An assortment of traditional flavor favorites. Cookie flavors include:Chocolate ChipCookie Crunch Macadamia

name: Pretzel Bagel Bite Platter
description: The Pretzel Bagel Bite Platter is always a party pleaser.Includes hummus and cream cheese dip, gourmet pretzel bites, sliced cucumbers, grape tomatoes, bell pepper strips, and Horseradish Bread and Butter Pickle Chips.

name: Lemon Chicken Lettuce Wraps
description: Lemon Pepper Chicken Breast, tomatoes, cucumbers, feta cheese and Tzatziki Sauce wrapped in crisp lettuce

name: Chilled Baked Chicken Tenders Platter
description: Boneless, baked white meat chicken tenders, cooked to perfection and fresh chilled. Includes dipping sauce.Made fresh Ready to eat Served chilled

name: Turkey Salad Platter
description: Slow Roasted Turkey, Colby jack cheese, shredded carrots, crispy onion strips, dried apricots, grape tomatoes, and pecan pieces on a bed of mixed greens with ranch dressing.

name: Chef Salad Platter
description: Bed of lettuce blend, garlic infused ham, turkey with a savory 3 pepper Colby Jack cheese. Mixings include pico de gallo, egg, cucumber, and black olives. Served with a delightful jalapeÃ±o ranch dressing.

name: Large Brunch Delights Platter
description: A delightful variety of breakfast favorites is offered, featuring an enticing selection of assorted cornbread toaster tops, delicious raspberry Danish strips, and adorable petit cinnamon buns. Each item is crafted to appeal to your morning cravings, ensuring a satisfying start to your day. 48 count of items, serves up to 35.

name: Italian Style Caprese Pasta Bowl
description: Perfectly cooked penne pasta, combined with freshly diced tomatoes bursting with flavor, crisp onions that add a satisfying crunch, sweet red peppers for an additional layer of taste, and delightful mozzarella pearls come together beautifully. All of this is enhanced by a generous drizzle of rich balsamic vinegar, creating a vibrant, tangy flavor combination that your guests will absolutely love.

name: Caesar Pasta Salad Bowl
description: Enjoy tender cooked macaroni tossed with artichoke hearts, red bell peppers, spinach, Romano cheese, and pitted Kalamata olives. Itâ€™s all brought together with a proprietary blend of mild cayenne pepper, red wine vinegar, Worcestershire sauce, and select spices. Prepared fresh for your yacht charter, this vibrant salad is perfect as a flavorful side or a light, satisfying main dish to enjoy while relaxing on the water. Serves about 10 people.

name: Macaron and Chocolate Strawberry Platter
description: A delightful and sweet selection of 16 assorted macarons featuring delicious flavors such as rich chocolate, vibrant strawberry, tart raspberry, and festive birthday cake, elegantly paired with 14 fresh, juicy chocolate-covered strawberries. This beautifully curated dessert option is perfect for enhancing your yacht charter experience, adding a touch of sweetness to your special occasion. Serves around 15-20 people.

name: Large Charcuterie Platter
description: Savory Sopressata, Genoa Salami, Vermont Cheddar, Provolone, Grapes, Strawberries, Fig Crisps, Water Crackers, and Fig Spread.Great for tandem charters or large group bookings, serves 26.
